databaseConfig.sql: SELECT MS_LO.MS_LO_ID, MS_LO.LO_NAME, MS_LO.KAMOKU_NO, MS_LO.MS_TANI_ID, MS_TANI.TANI_NAME as MS_TANI_NAME, MS_LO.SEND_FLAG, MS_LO.VESSEL_ID, MS_LO.DATA_NO, MS_LO.USER_KEY, MS_LO.RENEW_DATE, MS_LO.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_LO.TS FROM MS_LO left join MS_TANI on MS_LO.MS_TANI_ID = MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID

SELECT MS_LO.MS_LO_ID, MS_LO.LO_NAME, MS_LO.KAMOKU_NO, MS_LO.MS_TANI_ID, MS_TANI.TANI_NAME as MS_TANI_NAME, MS_LO.SEND_FLAG, MS_LO.VESSEL_ID, MS_LO.DATA_NO, MS_LO.USER_KEY, MS_LO.RENEW_DATE, MS_LO.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_LO.TS FROM MS_LO left join MS_TANI on MS_LO.MS_TANI_ID = MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID
where MS_LO_ID = :MS_LO_ID

INSERT INTO MS_LO( MS_LO_ID, LO_NAME, KAMOKU_NO, MS_TANI_ID, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES ( :MS_LO_ID, :LO_NAME, :KAMOKU_NO, :MS_TANI_ID, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_LO SET LO_NAME = :LO_NAME, KAMOKU_NO = :KAMOKU_NO, MS_TANI_ID = :MS_TANI_ID, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_LO_ID = :MS_LO_ID AND TS = :TS

DELETE FROM MS_LO
WHERE MS_LO_ID = :MS_LO_ID AND TS = :TS
